oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Combining Complementary Ligands into one Framework for the Construction of a Ferromagnetically Coupled [Mn-12(III)] Wheel
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SANZ, S
FROST, JM
RAJESHKUMAR, T
DALGARNO, SJ
RAJARAMAN, G
WERNSDORFER, W

BRECHIN, EK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: density functional calculations
finite-temperature Lanczos method
manganese
molecular magnets
self-assembly
SINGLE-MOLECULE MAGNETS
SPIN GROUND-STATE
LANCZOS METHOD
LOOP STRUCTURE
MIXED-VALENT
SHAPED MN-12
SOLID-STATE
COMPLEXES
MANGANESE
SYSTEMS
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Phenolic oxime and diethanolamine moieties have been combined into one organic framework, resulting in the formation of a novel ligand type that can be employed to construct a rare and unusual dodecametallic Mn wheel, within which nearest neighbours are coupled ferromagnetically.
